H3.text: The first was published in 195. Whose series of five novels featured the conman murderer 'Tom Ripley'. Mary Plangman

A4.text: Patricia Highsmith wrote the first novel in the Tom Ripley series, The Talented Mr. Ripley, which was published in December 1955.

A5.text: Patricia Highsmith was born Mary Patricia Plangman.
